root.name: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
root.description: GameplayThe player controls a reticule and moves it around while moving the camera. In essence this is an on-rails shooter. The A button shoots the rail gun, and the B button shoots rockets. Power-ups are picked up by shooting them, and everything can be damaged, even buildings in the background.Terminator 2 for the Game Boy is difficult, but rewards memorization. Enemies always pop up in the same spots, and therefore the game can be made easier through repetition. Enemies include T-800s in their exoskeleton form, aircrafts that shoot destroyable bubbles at you, and bosses at the end that have multiple destructible sections and/or forms.
